title: The Lady in The Window: A compilation of short horror stories
description: The Lady In the Window is a compilation of short horror stories. Inside you will find Ghost, Vampires, Werewolves, unnatural beasts, and much more. Each story is unique and will keep you guessing the entire time. Included at the end of the book is the first chapter of my new up and coming novella The Cypress Hills Samantha's Legacy.
author: Angel Ernst
